class Person {
  age: number
  gender: string
  constructor(age: number, gender: string) {
    this.age = age
    this.gender = gender
  }
}

class Point {
  x = 1
  y = 2
  scale(n: number): void {
    this.x *= n
    this.y *= n
  }
}

ğŸŸ¡ ç»§æ‰¿çˆ¶ç±»

class Animal {
  move() {
    console.log('moving along !')
  }
}
class Dog extends Animal {
  bark() {
    console.log('wang wang wang !!')
  }
}

const dog = new Dog()
dog.move()
dog.bark()
